kjv_def: blessing (a matter of) bounty (X -tifully), fair speech
strongs_def: fine speaking, i.e. elegance of language; commendation ("eulogy"), i.e. (reverentially) adoration; religiously, benediction; by implication, consecration; by extension, benefit or largess
outline:
1. praise, laudation, panegyric: of Christ or God
  2. fine discourse, polished language
    1. in a bad sense, language artfully adapted to captivate the hearer: fair speaking, fine speeches
  3. an invocation of blessing, benediction
  4. consecration
  5. a (concrete) blessing, benefit
